A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving witch (Debbieloff Young), an ancient feller creature trying to obtain the Phoenix Gate, an Egyptian god, and Alice’s father and his girlfriend Catherine Deane. But with the help of Cleo is he/ or she able to defeat evil? If so ,what will happen after the battle?<|end_of_text|>
